attributes.action: Create a website where the general public can report car registrations of people commiting petty driving offences (i.e. mobile use while driving and parking in disabled bays illegally)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A website to report the reg numbers of motor vehicles committing petty driving offences, which usually go unpunished, but are non the less dangerous. These would include mobile phone use whilst driving and parking illegally in a disabled bay.
